"Chitose": "Thanks a bunch! Now I can get outta here."
"...Oh, hold on. While you're here, mind helping me with something else?"
"See, we've been gathering data in this energy plant, right?"
"There's just one thing I haven't got data on yet. It's smack-dab in the middle of the plant; it's like the biggest thing here."
"There's a bunch of strong enemies there, so I prolly couldn't get close..."
"Sooo... Think you could go and get the data in my place? Should be no problem with skills like yours, right? Thaaanks!"
